programme.desc: Documentales/Historia | 2019 | +12 | *6.0/10 · En Abril de 1944, dos prisioneros judíos escaparon milagrosamente de Auschwitz. Cuando contaron lo que habían dejado atrás, su testimonio desgarrador reveló al mundo por primera vez el verdadero horror del holocausto. Votos: 4. · Título original: 1944: Should We Bomb Auschwitz? · País: R.U. · Dirección: Tim Dunn. · Productora: Oxford Film & Television.

programme.title: Documentos TV T24/25
programme.desc: Información/Reportaje | 2024 | +12 · Prestigiosos reportajes y documentales de televisiones y productoras de todo el mundo. · País: España · Dirección: Pilar Requena. · Productora: Televisión Española (TVE).

programme.title: Un año en el hielo. La deriva Ártica
programme.desc: Documentales/Naturaleza | 2023 | TP | *10.0/10 · La historia de la expedición polar más grande de la historia. Votos: 1. · Título original: A Year in the Ice: The Arctic Drift · País: EE.UU. · Dirección: Ashley Morris.

programme.title: La tumba tóxica de Tutankamón
programme.desc: Documentales/Historia | 2022 | TP | *8.0/10 · El 26 de noviembre de 1922, Howard Carter realizó el mayor hallazgo arqueológico de todos los tiempos: la tumba llena de tesoros del niño rey egipcio Tutankamón. Votos: 24. · Título original: Tut's Toxic Tomb · País: R.U. · Productora: National Geographic.

programme.title: Viajar en tren
programme.desc: Documentales/Viajes | 2022 | TP | *10.0/10 · Serie documental sobre importantes ferrocarriles de todo el mundo. Con el tren actuando como guía, el programa atraviesa lugares especiales. Cada episodio comienza con un retrato de la ciudad de donde parte el tren. Votos: 1. · País: Holanda · Productora: EO International, Meskers Media Affairs B.V.

programme.desc: A love affair becomes a menacing game of cat and mouse where nothing is what it seems.

programme.title: The Last Breath
programme.desc: A diver's lifelong search for a World War II shipwreck leads to a life-and-death dive, where he and his friends must confront their own limits and fears before time runs out.

programme.title: A Lot of Nothing
programme.desc: James and Vanessa are ostensibly the perfect married couple. Their lives spiral out of control when they decide to seek justice against a neighbor they saw commit a crime on the evening news.

programme.title: A Discovery of Witches
programme.desc: Diana learns the tragic circumstances surrounding why she was spellbound as a child; Diana's devastation at having lived her life as only half herself is interrupted by the Madison house releasing one of the missing pages from Ashmole 782.

programme.title: A Discovery of Witches
programme.desc: Matthew's attempt to rescue Diana from Juliette goes horribly wrong; Diana discovers just how lethal her powers can be; as Matthew is dying, Diana must strike a dreadful bargain with the goddess and make the ultimate sacrificial pact.

programme.title: A Discovery of Witches
programme.desc: In Oxford's library, American historian and reluctant witch Diana Bishop unwittingly calls up an ancient magical manuscript, and finds herself confronted by geneticist and vampire Matthew Clairmont, who is determined to get his hands on the book.

programme.title: A Discovery of Witches
programme.desc: Blind to the interest she has stirred amongst creatures, Diana fights an increasing pull towards the magical and turns her back on her witch heritage; matters take an unexpectedly dark turn when Satu is sent by Peter Knox to intimidate her.

programme.title: A Discovery of Witches
programme.desc: Domenico takes Satu's information to menacing vampire Gerbert, who gains the advantage he has been waiting for; Diana refuses to help Knox realize his longing to destroy the vampires and answers his threats with a force of untamed elemental power.

programme.title: A Discovery of Witches
programme.desc: Matthew's hope of keeping Diana safe is short-lived as Ysabeau refuses to welcome the warmblood; Knox calls an emergency meeting of the Congregation to denounce Matthew; Matthew's ferocious brother, Baldwin, plays a careful game to maintain control.

programme.title: A Discovery of Witches
programme.desc: Gillian pays a price for her disloyalty to Diana; the vampires study witch DNA; the fall-out threatens the fragile equilibrium between creatures and the focus is on ending Matthew and Diana's relationship, whatever the cost.

programme.title: Sanctuary: A Witch's Tale
programme.desc: When a teen sports star dies, the community of Sanctuary is shattered; DCI Knight expects a straightforward investigation but the response of Harper, daughter of a local witch, leads her to suspect there's more to his death than meets the eye.

programme.title: Sanctuary: A Witch's Tale
programme.desc: When non-witch daughter Harper is accused of murder, Sarah must use her magic to prove her innocence; fueled by local resentments, suspicions transfer to mother and daughter, while Abigail tries to blackmail Sarah with an extraordinary demand.

programme.title: Sanctuary: A Witch's Tale
programme.desc: An expert confirms that magic was present at the crime scene; Harper makes a shocking revelation to Sarah who warns that her disclosure, if revealed to the police, will make her a suspect; an accusation from Harper sends Abigail into revenge mode.
